comment: The game rotates anticlockwise, so the game is very difficult to play.  I understand I'm using a Huawei Watch, but I am happy to rate 5 stars if it becomes compatible for this.  Otherwise, the gameplay is very good, but I can't play it properly.
title: The game auto rotates

author: J
comment: When the app is launched all it does is put my watch into landscape then back to portrait. It doesn't launch anything really just changes the orientation of my watch face. Thanks for making this game for Android wear though. Hope you can fix this. Because it would be awesome to have this on my wrist! 🚀
title: Using a LG G Watch

author: N Ibbo
comment: Just get a blank screen and locks up. Moto 360
title: Not working

author: MLGMASTERBOSS
comment: Possibly best game on android wear

author: Ivan Yudhi
comment: It's somewhat similar to Flappy Bird, but less frustrating. Very cool. Make sure to use the original launcher. It will crash if you use the Wear Mini Launcher

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks Ivan! Please update your Wear Mini Launcher, the developer released a fix to resolve the black screen issue when starting our game.

title: Very nice

author: Jonathan Mauney
comment: Orientation is wrong on Moto 360! Looks great otherwise.

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content:
Hello Jonathan, 

Our latest update fixes the orientation on Moto 360. Please update your copy. Thanks!

title: Could be great

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: 6/26 Update - Please update your Wear Mini Launcher, the developer released a fix to resolve the black screen issue when starting our game.

author: Matthew W
comment: Tried installing it twice and I can not get the application to work. Hopefully it will be fixed soon. *Edit* After the 4th installation I got the game to show up on my watch. However the game goes to a black screen and then eventually boots you back to the Watch face. Seems to have some bugs still. -Great attempt so far can't wait to see the final product. #edit 2# developer responded promptly and said he will be fixing the issues

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: 6/26 Update - Please update your Wear Mini Launcher, the developer released a fix to resolve the black screen issue when starting our game.

title: Not working on Gear Live

author: Mike Sweeney
comment: LG G Watch. It looks like it launches, blanks the screen, but nothing happens and the screen just times out back to the watch face. (Will try a new version and update rating accordingly) NOT A GAME ISSUE MAYBE, INVESTIGATING. 5 stars while we figure it out, awesome communication.

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: 6/26 Update - Please update your Wear Mini Launcher, the developer released a fix to resolve the black screen issue when starting our game.

title: Won't open

comment: This game will literally crash your wear device. You will have to wait till it dies and then uninstall it

comment: Landscape orientation does not work on a WRISTWATCH
title: It's sideways...

author: Harry Cutts
comment: Rotates the screen when it displays the unity logo then rotates back to normal and plays great and the music is nice too
title: First wear game with sound

comment: Come on wear devs. Put a little effort in!
